title: BARBARIANS Ending Explained + Real Life History!
author: Think Story
comment: I love that the Romans speak Latin in this show
The wolf is a "deathly omen". It represents Roman vengeance is coming. That's why Arminius looks concerned when he sees it.

"The Greatest defeat!" ... people tend to forget that Rome lost many battles and had far greater losses. In the times of Hannibal they faced almost total destruction. The thing that makes Romans different is that they always came back with full force, they could regenerate their forces faster than opponents. That is until late Roman empire .....
The main thing that did this movie great was languages part, they spoke latin and german  and not English
description:
In this video we explain the ending and real life history of Netflix's latest historical show from Germany "Barbarians" which depicts the Germanic tribes against the Roman forces at the Battle of Teutoburg Forest.
